KnowledgeBase.Title: Example Boolean compareEQ 009
KnowledgeBase.RelatedFunctions: compare compareNE compareGT compareGE compareLT compareLE

Example.Description: These examples use the compareEQ function to compare two objects and return the Boolean value, true or false. The values of each objects are compared to determine whether the objects are equal or not.

Syntax.Note: The Boolean value false has a state value of 1.
The result from the &#62 operation is also the value 1.
